mapper.select: select cal_id, cal_title, cal_place, cal_content, DATE_FORMAT(cal_start, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cal_start, DATE_FORMAT(cal_end, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cal_end, cal_range, cal_allday, cal_show, cal_notice, c.empno as empno, check_admin, approval, p.name as ename from calendar c, personal_info p where c.empno = p.empno order by cal_start

select cal_id, cal_title, cal_place, cal_content, DATE_FORMAT(cal_start, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cal_start, DATE_FORMAT(cal_end, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as cal_end, cal_range, cal_allday, cal_show, cal_notice, c.empno as empno, check_admin, approval, p.name as ename from calendar c, personal_info p where c.empno = p.empno and cal_start between #{calStart} and #{calEnd} order by cal_start
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(cal_title, cal_place, cal_content, cal_start, cal_end, cal_range, cal_allday, cal_show, cal_notice, empno, check_admin, approval) values (#{calTitle}, #{calPlace}, #{calContent}, #{calStart}, #{calEnd}, #{calRange}, #{calAllday}, #{calShow}, #{calNotice}, #{empno}, #{checkAdmin}, #{approval})
